title.narrative: Ahead of the Curve SMEs Competition

description.narrative:
We will select 3 companies to enter into a dedicated scale-up trajectory; 1 company per country. The pilot will be running in Somalia, Egypt, and Uganda. The goal of the trajectory is to professionalize their (international) growth strategy and where possible to help find (international) partners, in supply, trade or investment.
Objectives The primary objective of the competition is to accelerate societal (innovative) impact through SMEs and start-ups <(>&<)> job opportunities for youth. The secondary objective of this pilot is to get the best examples of impact-driven SMEs in our countries and understand what it takes for them to scale-up, both their business and impact. This will allow us to improve our programme further by including working with superstar impact SMEs into our approach. Thirdly, we can use these #superstars# as best examples of the kind of companies we want to support, so to use it in our communication towards donors, investors, other Oxfam countries and other stakeholders.

participating-org.narrative: Ahead of the Curve (ATC) is a social business dedicated to the promotion of sustainable management practice, inclusive market growth and social innovation. It strives to use alternative and innovative pathways to achieving sustainable development within growth markets. It does this by supporting the creation of ecosystems and building platforms geared towards sustainable and inclusive economic growth. Their mission is achieved through the provision of technical assistance, research and policy advocacy, capacity building as well as direct investing into early stage businesses with the potential for scalable societal impact and high financial returns.

mailing-address.narrative: PO box 30919, 2500 GX The Hague, The Netherlands

sector.narrative: The right to social and political participation
